description: Stylesheet for theme management and layout of the React Tic Tac Toe application.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with center alignment and theme-based background color.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the application logo, including animation effects.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application with flexible layout.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for application links with theme-based color.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling between light and dark themes with hover effects.
